languages.text: "Его изготавливали на Ефрате-II. Аксиоманта, ученица Амарната, была взята мной в плен и передала все разработки наставника. А во главе производства встал ваш знакомый, амбициозный техножрец Кубис Дельфим. Сожалею о его падении, видимо, дерзкие и неортодоксальные вещи, которые он совершал по моему приказу, сокрушили его обеты и толкнули в объятия ереси".

"It was made on Eufrates II. I captured Amarnat's student, Axiomantha, and she passed all of her mentor's drafts to me. And the one overseeing the process was none other than your acquaintance, the Tech-Priest Cubis Delphim. His fall was regrettable. It seems that the unorthodox, daring things he did at my behest drove him to break his vows and sink into heresy."
languages.original_text: "Его изготавливали на Ефрате-II. Аксиоманта, ученица Амарната, была взята мной в плен и передала все разработки наставника. А во главе производства встал ваш знакомый, амбициозный техножрец Кубис Дельфим. Сожалею о его падении, видимо, дерзкие и неортодоксальные вещи, которые он совершал по моему приказу, сокрушили его обеты и толкнули в объятия ереси".

traits.locale_text: "It has been produced on Eufrates II. I captured Amarnat's student, Axiomanta, and she passed all of her mentor's development drafts to me. And the one at the head of the production was none other than your acquaintance, the Tech-Priest Cubis Delphim. I'm quite sad to hear about his fall — it seems that the unorthodox, audacious things that he had done at my behest had driven him to break his vows and to fall into heresy."

"It has been produced on Eufrates II. I captured Amarnat's student, Axiomanta, and she passed all of her mentor's development drafts to me. And the one at the head of the production was none other than your acquaintance, the Tech-Priest Cubis Delphim. I'm quite sad to hear about his fall — it seems that the unorthodox, audacious things that he had done at my behest had driven him to break his vows and to fall into heresy."

And the one overseeing the process was none other than your acquaintance, the Tech-Priest Cubis Delphim. His fall was regrettable. It seems that the unorthodox, daring things he did at my behest drove him to break his vows and sink into heresy."

languages.text: « Il a été produit sur Euphrate-II. J'ai capturé l'élève d'Amarnat, Axiomantha, qui m'a transmis toutes les ébauches de son mentor. La production a été supervisée par l'une de vos connaissances, le technoprêtre Cubis Delphim. Sa chute est fort regrettable. Apparemment, les actes audacieux et peu orthodoxes qu'il a accomplis sur mes ordres l'ont poussé à rompre ses vœux et à sombrer dans l'hérésie. »
languages.original_text: "It was made on Eufrates II. I captured Amarnat's student, Axiomantha, and she passed all of her mentor's drafts to me. And the one overseeing the process was none other than your acquaintance, the Tech-Priest Cubis Delphim. His fall was regrettable. It seems that the unorthodox, daring things he did at my behest drove him to break his vows and sink into heresy."

traits.locale_text: « Il a été produit sur Euphrate-II. J'ai capturé l'élève d'Amarnat, Axiomantha, qui m'a transmis toutes les ébauches de développement de son mentor. La production a été supervisée par une de vos connaissances, le technoprêtre Cubis Delphim. Sa chute est fort regrettable. Apparemment, les choses audacieuses et peu orthodoxes qu'il a accomplies sur mes ordres l'ont poussé à rompre ses vœux et à tomber dans l'hérésie. »

languages.text: «Se fabricó en Eufrates II. Capturé a una estudiante de Amarnat, Axiomantha, que me entregó todos los borradores de su mentor. Y el supervisor del proceso fue nada más y nada menos que el tecnosacerdote Cubis Delphim, a quien ya conoce. Su caída fue lamentable. Parece que las acciones atrevidas y poco ortodoxas que realizó bajo mi guía le llevaron a romper sus juramentos y abandonarse a la herejía».
languages.original_text: "It was made on Eufrates II. I captured Amarnat's student, Axiomantha, and she passed all of her mentor's drafts to me. And the one overseeing the process was none other than your acquaintance, the Tech-Priest Cubis Delphim. His fall was regrettable. It seems that the unorthodox, daring things he did at my behest drove him to break his vows and sink into heresy."

traits.locale_text: «Lo produjimos en Eufrates II. Capturé a la estudiante de Amarnat, Axiomanta, y me entregó todos los borradores de desarrollo de su mentor. Y a cargo de la supervisión estaba nada menos que un conocido suyo, el tecnosacerdote Cubis Delphim. Me entristece haber oído hablar de su caída. Parece que las acciones osadas y poco ortodoxas que tomó bajo mis órdenes le empujaron a romper sus juramentos y caer en la herejía».

languages.text: “圣枷是在欧夫拉茨二号星造出来的。我抓住了阿玛纳特的学徒阿修曼塔，她把她的导师所有的手稿都交给了我。负责监督圣枷制作过程的人不是别人，正是你的熟人，技术神甫库比斯·德尔菲姆。他的背叛让我很是难过。看来，由于我命令他进行不正统的大胆尝试，导致他最终违背了自己的誓言，踏上了异端的道路。”
languages.original_text: "It was made on Eufrates II. I captured Amarnat's student, Axiomantha, and she passed all of her mentor's drafts to me. And the one overseeing the process was none other than your acquaintance, the Tech-Priest Cubis Delphim. His fall was regrettable. It seems that the unorthodox, daring things he did at my behest drove him to break his vows and sink into heresy."

traits.locale_text: “圣枷是在欧夫拉茨二号星制造出来的。我抓住了阿玛纳特的学徒阿修曼塔，她把她的导师所有的研发手稿都交给了我。负责监督圣枷制作过程的人不是别人，正是你的熟人，技术祭司库比斯·德尔菲姆。听说他叛变的消息时，我很难过。看来，由于我命令他做那些不正统的大胆事情，他最终违背了自己的誓言，踏上了异端的道路。”

languages.text: "Es wurde auf Eufrates II hergestellt. Ich habe Amarnats Schülerin Axiomantha gefangen genommen, und sie hat mir alle Entwürfe ihres Mentors gegeben. Beaufsichtigt wurde der Prozess von niemand Geringerem als Eurer Bekanntschaft, dem Techpriester Cubis Delphim. Sein Fall war bedauerlich. Die unorthodoxen, verwegenen Dinge, die er auf mein Geheiß hin getan hat, haben ihn wohl dazu gebracht, seinen Eid zu brechen und der Ketzerei zu verfallen."
languages.original_text: "It was made on Eufrates II. I captured Amarnat's student, Axiomantha, and she passed all of her mentor's drafts to me. And the one overseeing the process was none other than your acquaintance, the Tech-Priest Cubis Delphim. His fall was regrettable. It seems that the unorthodox, daring things he did at my behest drove him to break his vows and sink into heresy."

traits.locale_text: "Die Produktion fand auf Eufrates II statt. Ich habe Amarnats Schülerin Axiomanta gefangen genommen, und sie hat mit alle Entwürfe ihres Mentors zur Verfügung gestellt. Und überwacht wurde die Produktion von niemand Geringerem als Eurem Bekannten, dem Techpriester Cubis Delphim. Ich bin sehr betrübt über seinen Niedergang. Die unorthodoxen, verwegenen Dinge, die er auf mein Geheiß hin getan hat, haben ihn wohl dazu getrieben, seinen Eid zu brechen und in die Ketzerei zu fallen."

languages.text: 「ユーフラテス・IIで製作されたものだ。私はアマルナトの教え子であるアクシオマンサを捕らえ、彼女は師匠の草稿をすべて私に差し出した。そして、その工程を監督していたのが、あなたの知人である技術司祭キュビス・デルフィムだった。彼の凋落は、実に残念なことだ。私の命令で行った正統ではない大胆な行動が、彼に誓いを破らせ、異端へと陥らせたようだ」
languages.original_text: "It was made on Eufrates II. I captured Amarnat's student, Axiomantha, and she passed all of her mentor's drafts to me. And the one overseeing the process was none other than your acquaintance, the Tech-Priest Cubis Delphim. His fall was regrettable. It seems that the unorthodox, daring things he did at my behest drove him to break his vows and sink into heresy."

traits.locale_text: 「ユーフラテス・IIで製作されたものだ。私はアマルナトの教え子であるアクシオマンサを捕らえ、彼女は師匠の草稿をすべて私に差し出した。そして、その工程を監督していたのが、あなたの知人である技術司祭キュビス・デルフィムだった。彼の凋落は、実に残念なことだ。私の命令で行った正統ではない大胆な行動が、彼に誓いを破らせ、異端へと陥らせたようだ」

languages.text: "Eufrates II'de yapıldı. Amarnat'ın öğrencisi olan Axiomantha'yı ele geçirdim, o da yönderinin çalışmalarını bana verdi. Süreci gözleyen kişi de tanıdığın Tekno Rahip Cubis Delphim'den başkası değildi. Vefatına üzüldüm. Benim emrimle yaptığı alışılmadık ve cüretkâr şeyler, yeminini bozup kâfirliğe teslim olmasına yol açmış sanırım."
languages.original_text: "It was made on Eufrates II. I captured Amarnat's student, Axiomantha, and she passed all of her mentor's drafts to me. And the one overseeing the process was none other than your acquaintance, the Tech-Priest Cubis Delphim. His fall was regrettable. It seems that the unorthodox, daring things he did at my behest drove him to break his vows and sink into heresy."
